message:
Long overdue, #Backpage shuts down the adult ad section! The Senate Investigations Subcommittee report said Backpage has "knowingly concealed evidence of criminality by systematically editing its adult ads" for up to a decade by filtering out terms including "lolita," "teenage," "rape," "young," "amber alert," "little girl," "teen," "fresh," "innocent," and "school girl."
#BigWin #NotForSale

http://lat.ms/2jxoAKH
